label: industryCategory
comment: The industry categories for this organisations.  Recommend use of UNCPC as the category scheme. for example  id:unstats.un.org/isic/1030  code:10  name:Manufacture of food products  schemeID:unstats.un.org/unsd/classifications/Econ/isic  schemeName:ISIC

rangeIncludes.comment: A classification scheme and code / name representing a category value for a product, entity, or facility.

domainIncludes.comment: An organisation.  May be a supply chain actor, a certifier, a government agency.
